verses.verse: An Alleluia. Sing to the Lord a new song. Praise is his due in the congregation of saints.
Let Israel rejoice in his maker; and the children of Sion exult in their king.
Let them praise his name in choirs; on the tympanum and psaltery sing praises to him:
for the Lord taketh pleasure in his people; and with salvation he will exalt the meek.
Let the saints triumph in glory; and exult with joy on their beds.
Let the high praises of God be in their mouth; and in their hands two edged swords;
to execute vengeance on the nations; rebukes among peoples.
To bind their kings with fetters; and their nobles with chains of iron:
to execute on them the judgments written. Such is the honour which all his saints have.
